columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device
columns.Name: DeviceName

columns.Description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. This indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 10 and Windows 7
columns.Name: OSPlatform

columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration
columns.Name: ConfigurationId

columns.Description: Category or grouping to which the configuration belongs
columns.Name: ConfigurationCategory

columns.Description: Subcategory or subgrouping to which the configuration belongs. In many cases, this describes specific capabilities or features.
columns.Name: ConfigurationSubcategory

columns.Description: Rated impact of the configuration to the overall configuration score (1-10)
columns.Name: ConfigurationImpact

columns.Description: Indicates whether the configuration or policy is properly configured
columns.Name: IsCompliant

columns.Description: Indicates whether the configuration or policy is applicable
columns.Name: IsApplicable

columns.Description: Configuration context data of the machine
columns.Name: Context

columns.Description: Indicates whether there will be user impact if the configuration will be applied
columns.Name: IsExpectedUserImpact
